title: WORST SERIES OF MATCHMAKING EVER
body:
Fucking fix this shit seriously. I climbed steadily to plat 1 in the past 3 months, hoping to get diamond and then leave.

By steadily, I mean I lost games, I won games, I did OK in lane, won on average more than my opponent, so I climbed at a steady rate.

But literally in the past week, I have been getting matched with the trashest botlanes anyone has ever seen. I mean I have mostly been beating my top lane as trynd consistently, after watching fogged and reading his guides, learning the matchups etc. But then I come out of lane and the consistent theme is that both my adc and sup is 0/3 AT LEAST. And the game snowballs away from there. 

This has happened over a week and I have dropped from plat 1 to plat 4. I seriously implore anyone to check my most recent match history. When you do, please find me the average amount of botlanes that I have had that have ended the game with a positive score. Trust me, the average number will be so low, because they have been so fucking scarce. 

Fuck this game, I have uninstalled as these series of losses has demotivated me heavily. Trash fucking community, there are far better things to do with my time.
